description: This creamy chicken & pesto pasta is perfect for a midweek dinner. You only need four ingredients and it's ready in 20 minutes.
keywords: Pesto pasta,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken,Budget
name: Creamy Chicken & Pesto Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Australian RSPCA approved chicken breast fillets

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain and return to pan.

Meanwhile, heat 1 tbs extra virgin olive oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken, turning occasionally, for 12 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Remove chicken from pan and cover to keep warm.
Add cream to pan and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 3 minutes or until cream has reduced slightly. Meanwhile, thickly slice chicken, then shred into pieces.
Add pasta, chicken and pesto to cream mixture. Toss gently to combine. Season and serve.
